edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image

Class PixelDataFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.PixelDataFactory

  • public class PixelDataFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory to construct PixelData objects; the choice of implementation will be made based on the properties of the data.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PixelDataFactory()
      Constructs a new default PixelDataFactory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PixelData createPixelData(ImageCoordinate sizes, int data_type, java.lang.String dimensionOrder)
      Constructs a new pixeldata object using an ImageCoordinate to specify the size of the pixeldata.
      PixelData createPixelData(int size_x, int size_y, int size_z, int size_c, int size_t, int data_type, java.lang.String dimensionOrder)
      Convenience constructor for creating a PixelData object with individual dimension sizes instead of the sizes lumped into an ImageCoordinate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PixelDataFactory

        public PixelDataFactory()
        Constructs a new default PixelDataFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • createPixelData

        public PixelData createPixelData(ImageCoordinate sizes,
                        int data_type,
                        java.lang.String dimensionOrder)
        Constructs a new pixeldata object using an ImageCoordinate to specify the size of the pixeldata.
        Parameters:
        sizes - An ImageCoordinate that specifies the size of the pixeldata in all 5 (XYZCT) dimensions.
        data_type - An integer that specifies the numeric type of the on-disk representation of this data; valid values are from FormatTools
        dimensionOrder - A string made up of the characters "XYZCT" in any order that specifies the order of the dimensions in the on-disk representation.
        Returns:
        A new PixelData with the specified options.

      • createPixelData

        public PixelData createPixelData(int size_x,
                        int size_y,
                        int size_z,
                        int size_c,
                        int size_t,
                        int data_type,
                        java.lang.String dimensionOrder)
        Convenience constructor for creating a PixelData object with individual dimension sizes instead of the sizes lumped into an ImageCoordinate.
        Parameters:
        size_x - Size of the pixel data in the X-dimension.
        size_y - Size of the pixel data in the Y-dimension.
        size_z - Size of the pixel data in the Z-dimension.
        size_c - Size of the pixel data in the C-dimension.
        size_t - Size of the pixel data in the T-dimension.
        data_type - An integer that specifies the numeric type of the on-disk representation of this data; valid values are from FormatTools
        dimensionOrder - A string made up of the characters "XYZCT" in any order that specifies the order of the dimensions in the on-disk representation.
        Returns:
        A new PixelData with the specified options.
